column4: hey guys, i'm a kubuntu user, but it's telling me to upgrade to Ubuntu 11.04, am i or will it mess with my stuff...?
Kubuntu is just Ubuntu with a different default DE. If you're willing to try Kubuntu 11.04, that's the way to go
If you upgrade, it'll upgrade to Kubuntu 11.04, the version we're discussing here
actually, awesome idea. Ask in #kubuntu for exact details
